reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 384/98: TAX MATTERS - UNIVERSITIES AND OTHER INSTITUTIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: Tax matters — universities and other institutions
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 384/98: TAX MATTERS - UNIVERSITIES AND OTHER INSTITUTIONS

content.content: 1. The prescribed amount for the purposes of subsections 323 (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5) of the Act is $75 per year.  O. Reg. 129/02, s. 1; O. Reg. 297/03, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. The prescribed amount for the purposes of subsections 323 (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5) of the Act is $75 per year.  O. Reg. 129/02, s. 1; O. Reg. 297/03, s. 2.
